import { FC, useState } from 'react' import { Card, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const Signup: FC = () => { const [getValue, setValue] = useState({}) const getText = (e: any) => { const { name }: any = e.target const { value }: any = e.target setValue({ ...getValue, [name]: value }) } const submit = () => { console.log(getValue) } return (
Username getText(e)} placeholder="Username" /> Email getText(e)} placeholder="example@email.com" /> We'll never share your email! Password getText(e)} placeholder="Your password" />
) } export default Signup
